backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles and reward point accounts with access control and CRUD operations for profiles and redemption options.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to associated frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing several frontend reward-related components and styling configuration in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, authentication gating, and global providers including theming and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wrapper that blocks rendering until Internet Identity is initialized and authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save a profile name.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Catego: Renders a category spending breakdown card with color-coded bars and percentages.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateRa: Date range selector with preset ranges and a popover UI for analytics filtering.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Renders a monthly spending bar chart with proportional bar widths and fallback UI when no data is provided.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Points: Calculates and displays estimated reward points from transactions, highlighting total points and top earning categories.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TopMer: Shows the top merchants ranked by transaction frequency and total spend, with a simple empty‑state fallback.
Defines the main layout shell with header navigation, user greeting, routed content outlet, and footer branding.
frontend/src/components/rewards/Redempti: Provides a form to add a redemption option, including CPP preview and submission to backend via mutation hook.
Generates ranked redemption recommendations based on advisory settings and allows sorting by CPP or net value.
frontend/src/components/rewards/RewardPr: Simple form for creating a new reward profile by entering a point balance and submitting it to the backend.
Lists reward profiles and their redemption options, supporting adding new options and displaying CPP and net value per option.
frontend/src/components/settings/Earning: UI component that displays earning rate inputs per category and example point calculations using values from useEarningRates.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Csv: Wizard for uploading, mapping, previewing, and importing CSV transaction data with validation and bulk add support.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Filter panel allowing users to filter transactions by date, merchant, category, and card label, with a reset option.
Form for creating or editing a transaction, handling validation, state management, and save mutations.
Table that displays transactions with edit and delete actions and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEarningRates.ts: Hook that manages earning rate settings in localStorage and exposes update functions for categories and card overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardAdvisorySett: Stores and updates advisory settings in local storage, exposing current values and an update helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardProfiles.ts: Fetches reward profiles and provides mutations to add profiles or redemption options using a backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Manages transactions stored in local storage with querying and mutations for add, update, delete, and bulk import.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and design tokens for light and dark themes using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing spending analytics, charts, and date filtering based on stored transactions.
frontend/src/pages/HelpPage.tsx: Displays a help and guidance page with disclaimers and instructions for using key app features.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing marketing content, feature cards, and login actions for SpendWise.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Rewards management UI with tabs for reward programs, recommendations, and earning rate settings.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Transactions management page with filtering, CSV import, and add/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/types/earningRates.ts: Types defining earning rate structures and point estimate outputs.
frontend/src/types/rewards.ts: Reward types including extended profiles with calculated CPP and net values.
frontend/src/types/transactions.ts: Transaction and filter types plus helpers for categories, currencies, formatting, and date parsing.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Computes spending analytics including totals, category breakdowns, merchants, and trends.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Parses CSV text, coerces amounts and dates, and returns structured rows with warnings.
frontend/src/utils/pointsEstimate.ts: Calculates points earned by category using earning rates and optional card overrides.
frontend/src/utils/recommendations.ts: Ranks redemption options by CPP and net value with explanations and low-value flags.
frontend/src/utils/rewardsMath.ts: Utility math for CPP, net value calculations, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, requirements, and image needs for a credit card spending and reward‑analysis app.
